strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Menu Items Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget shows how to add items to the drop down menu of a gadget. Once an item is clicked on, a message box is shown as an event. These menu items are added in the dropdown available when clicking the down arrow in the gadget controls (top right when hovering over the gadget) or simply right clicking on the gadget.
